name: intranet-app
description: intranet para utilização interno do Hospital Estadual da Mãe de Mesquista

scripts.build-app: git pull && npm run build-client && npm install && npm start
scripts.build-client: mkdir -p public && cd client && npm run build-app && cd ..
scripts.start: pm2 start app.js -n Convertible9000 && pm2 monit

author: Gabriel Sales
